name: Defra Data Services Platform (arcgis map services)
description: Defra group have put in place the Data Services Platform to make environmental data openly available to a wide range of users. The platform includes spatial data feeds and APIs, supporting informed decisions and actions for the environment, food and farming, and rural economy. Data is available in commonly used formats and via APIs, with feeds suitable for GIS applications.
owner_name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (Defra)
